ability.name: Turnabout Is Fair Play
ability.flavor: All's fair in love and whatever.
ability.trigger: The target makes an ability roll that has an edge, a double edge, a bane, or a double bane.

effects.effect: An edge on the triggering roll becomes a bane, or a double edge becomes an edge. A bane becomes an edge, or a double bane becomes a bane.
An edge on the triggering roll becomes a double bane, or a double edge is negated. A bane becomes a double edge, or a double bane is negated.
